content: Disabling the Backup service will prevent {{productName}} administrators from creating backups. If Auto Backup is enabled, it will be deactivated. Are you sure you want to continue?

comment.text: This text appears in a confirmation dialog when disabling the Backup service. It warns administrators that disabling backups will prevent further backups and deactivate Auto Backup, prompting them to confirm their choice. The `productName` variable will be replaced with the product name.
